header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Obstacle course race, doing new things, being fit and attractive, a book called Witch Wars, dressing up as Peter Pan for a school assembly
header.activity: Family talking about obstacle course races
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, anecdote telling, making arrangements

body.u: so I just wanted to tell you guys about the fact that I have done an obstacle course race today which is the first time I've ever done one and I did it all on my own and I'm very proud and it was five kilometres and I got very muddy and very wet there were lots of things to jump through and under and over and climb up erm but mainly it was very muddy and I got a medal at the end which is the first sporting medal I have ever received in my entire life so there you are it just shows you that even at the age of thirty-nine you can still like achieve new things erm and as I was saying to you before I have a special one just for kids in September which is a mini version of it and I totally want you guys to do it what is your opinion ?
well I think it should be a small one cos it should be for kids and grown-ups cos not all grown-ups are as fit as you

do you know that's a totally valid point and in fact one of my friends who is the horror writer who you know of he is desperate to do something erm like that but he is very unfit now in fact it was a really relaxed race today and there were people who were quite old erm and lots of people were just walking it but one of the people erm injured themselves going up the hay bale because it was too difficult so I completely agree with you and I in fact I did say to cos he was like oh it looked like so much fun and I really want to go but I can't cos I'm so unfit and that's what I said to him I said take your daughters to the one on that the child-friendly one and cos you have to go around with them so if I if you guys both go then I have to go around with you of course and it'll be lots of fun erm and that that's a way of him seeing what he can do and also just seeing what it's like and then making him less scared cos it was a bit scary driving there on my own this morning obviously I didn't have anyone else to go with and I just thought gosh what is it going to be like? you know I just didn't have any I was I was really nervous but now I've done one I totally want to do heaps and heaps more and erm 's dad is doing quite a scary one in September the Spartan Race and that's really full on and they've got a fire and stuff in it but I'm now thinking do you know what? I think I'm gonna have a go cos at the end of the day it's gonna be no more than an hour and a half of my life and if I can't do you know all of the obstacles it doesn't really matter but it just made me realise today getting up those hay bales and how easy it was that I'm actually really quite strong so I can do the running and I can do the pulling up of the arm stuff so I reckon I've got a good chance of succeeding that so I'm gonna give it a go what are your thoughts?
yeah do you think I'll manage to succeed a little bit
also yeah and also you might be the only girl who has ever done it
oh no ha girls have done it before erm and I've always looked at their photographs and thought wow they look really fit but do you know what? I'm actually really fit
I am not like attractive fit if that's what you mean
I am obviously attractive fit as well erm but what erm what are your thoughts on you doing the muddy one?
bebecause normally you don't like getting dirty and that's my only issue but you will literally be covered from your nose to your toes you have to jump into
huge muddy muddy muddy deep puddles like Peppa Pig and my
I don't know if you noticed but my trainers are on the washing line I had to wash my trainers in the washing machine cos they were absolutely covered in mud
did you have to wash the rest was the rest of your clothes?
I had to wash everything everything everything everything they were so disgusting

do you know what? I had a big shower and I I was in the shower for ages and I thought thank goodness I've sorted out and then I was getting dressed and I noticed that I still had had loads of mud on my back
cost it's so kind of soaked in cos you do spend all of it totally submerged in mud
mum did you did you get mud on the thing here?
er I don't think well probably cos I was wearing very short shorts I was wearing pants as well obviously
did the shorts look like pants on you?
well you I haven't sshown you a photo no they just looked really really really really muddy
but like the pants are they muddy?

they are super muddy so you have to wear old clothes that you don't mind getting trashed cos they will be destroyed so I wore my old pair of trainers and I wore an old sports bra and an old top and an old pair of shorts and they
they well the sports bra was white and now it is still looking a little bit muddy even though it's washed so it's it's but the trainers have come up fine but you do well what I was also
I I need to get some more shorts

you need to get some okay yes you do that's true well you need to get PE type shorts for this anyway but yes you do need to get some what I was also thinking was that when your Brownies has finished or in the summer holidays I want to start and there is no ballet I would if you were okay with me doing this if it's on a weekend when I've got you guys I want to go back to the fortitude fitness centre where they do obstacle course practice and you could watch me go around or you could come around with me
yeah I think watching you go around something no
so is that hang on there is that big thing watery thing to jump in
can we do Witch Wars can we talk about Witch Wars now?
erm but hang on no but you definitely for sure definitely want to do the thing in September ?
can we talk a bit about your party?
well no no let's talk about Witch Wars what do you want to say
this is a book isn't it?
I've orig I've just I've read this kind of a long time though
and shall I tell you what it's about?
it's about a girl who doesn't have any parents but was found in the sink that means
she was found in the sink
which means somebody must of sent her up there
must have not must of then
must have sent her up there do you mean into a sink?
well what I don't know anything about her
it's T I G A T I G A
Tiga Whicabim I've always I always have called her Tigger
Tiga Whicabim that's a very hard word name to say isn't it?
well at the in the story
it doesn't actually tell you she's a witch but since all the witches live below the sinks
and she must she must have lived there
why are you laughing at me like I'm a mad person? cos if they live under the sink they must be small
no the pipes are big they're really big
no actually they just go down in the pipes and then there's a wholly lovely place with skies
so so that's their other world
shh so she's born in a sink is she raised by adults normal people?

so let me tell you so all the bad witches go up and they and one and one witch tortures the children by inventing Brussel sprouts
one witch tortures children by inventing Brussel sprouts
she she was one of the witches who le who left in the big leave which and

because all the witches thought look I don't want this place any more I want to go up there
hang on they are living amongst humans?
but they took all of the colour with them there's only
there's only a few books which if the witches came back they wouldn't be able to touch any of those colours in the whole room
how can you take colours? by magic?
no just that if er witches leave forever
I'm sorry I'm not keeping up with it
what are you laughing at me for?
when all the w the bad witches
must have some kind of connection so that whenever when they leave the colours just drained out because
so there are not very many colours down below?
except for four books which the witches
ha why do you keep saying books cos books aren't colours that's what I'm getting confused about?
oh because those are those are all the rulers who once ruled those are all the facts about the rulers
what? like a measuring thing? mm
what's that got to do with colours though?
well once that happens all the w once that once that happened all the rulers go into that book which a sign which erm if there's enough books then I think there might be new new colour
oh okay I'm with you now
so is this one of many
and then there's one which is called Witch Switch which I think the four
well we need to don't tap that
we need to get the co er coins sorted at the post office so we can go and buy some books for each other
yes and anyway enough about that erm a fairy called Fran
to go down to the pipes to compete in the witch wars and

does Tiga know that she's a bad person? does she like her?
she doesn't like her at all
but why is Tiga put upstairs?
stop laughing at me why was she put in the sink?
why is nasty witch raising her and looking after her?
well she was found in the sink but I think somebody like one of the bad witches
stole her and put her in the sink like that lady
does she know that does she not know that she's a witch?
and Tia or that lady comes up Fran?
in that story she doesn't even know she's a witch until the end

but she's kind she thinks she's a witch but she may not be a witch so I don't even know

she said you have to compete in witch wars and Miss Hex signed her up so she could get rid of her cos she thought
that maybe she'll win witch wars and then she would go and be gone forever

she does it in a few minutes

she's still following the hero's journey

shall I just shall I just read you a
shall I read you a chapter?
can I just pause you for a moment?

erm at thank you at the insane terrain the running race today there was a DJ doing lots of music to entertain the people hanging around and there was lots of kids hanging around watching their parents and they were playing some sort of old-fashioned music and then the DJ said just to let you know it is going to be cheese hour in two minutes
because when you get really naff music they call it cheesy music so we were having cheesy music for the whole hour there we are and that's what just from memory continue please
okay shall I read you a chapter?
no you can't read a chapter cos we're having a discussion about it
I know but can I just read one page so you get the idea?

no because you can do that later now can I just say we are going to this book launch not this Thursday but next Thursday by my friend and the person that erm is publishing it for him he was the publisher that that discovered JK Rowling and he has said that 's book reminds him of Harry Potter and that my friends is a very big phrase where the accolade indeed isn't it? so I cannot wait to read his story I think that's going to be amazing and that's a witchy story erm and there's and he's now found out today that he's gonna do two more books so it's going to be a trilogy
did I ask did I say can I say it?
shall I take it okay I won't say it
say it to me say it to me say it to me
has got a good idea for your birthday cake I'm not going to tell you what it is but you've just got to trust us that it is going to be brilliant
I'll have to kill you and then you wouldn't have a party

don't ask me to you know I can't keep secrets to save my life don't ask me but it's going to be very good and I can finish marking my cursed er exams on Thursday then I will lie in a corner of drool for about an hour
and then I will try and start baking your cake on Friday so it's ready for Sunday
so it's ready for the party don't ask you what what?
what do you not want me to ask you?
you're now going to give yourself hiccups now
can you tell me a bit more about your special assembly on Wednesday please? but don't spoil it for me otherwise we'll have to stop the recording if you're going to be silly
well it's about all the things that we've done
yeah and also we need to find a green T-shirt and green
right when were you going to mention that?
I've already mentioned that to you
you did not mention it to me when did when did you what do you need that for? what are
I'm gonna I'm gonna be a captain for Robin Hood and they offered me
oh we don't have the Peter Pan outfit any more do we?

well I don't have green leggings and a green T-shirt for you you'll be surprised to know cos I don't have a magic box that allows me to just request things surely you can wear your PE T-shirt which is green?
and the leggings that we used to have for 's Peter Pan thing are long gone so I don't have those but I'm wondering if we've got any brown
leggings or brown trousers from one of the nativity type things? why are shaking your head? don't you say to me now it has to be
right cos what you aren't going to say to me is that it has to be green because we've got three days to sort this out but yes you're right it could be erm
I also need to find a little hat
but again we don't have any of that any more
I will have a look upstairs to see if we've got any in the w dressing up

just draw moustache then they'll know

it is the story of Robin Hood he has a moustache

to read out a little note and we have to dress up as Robin Hood
well as I say I I may have kept 's Peter Pan costume for nostalgic reasons

you know when you remreminisce about something that happened and you're like ah I don't think I would have sold it but where it's gonna be upstairs I've no idea what about a tricorn hat? one of my hats?

okay how many points does a triangle have?

it's like the hat the one I had for my highwayman thing it's got a three points cos it's a tricorn
as opposed to a unicorn which has one point you're now being too silly
sorry I just didn't get it
can you calm down? you need to calm down have I got anything in my dressing up that you would be able to use?
let me see you can keep on doing the recording now
I can keep on doing the recording? thanks well no you need to stay here really can you not be Maid Marion? I've got loads of things for that I'm sure

you know it's kind of like

he said hello Prince John and it's what the prince does and ah the
